dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of 4694 aligned wide/shallow depth-of-field image pairs captured using the Canon 7D DSLR with 50mm f/1.8 lenses, initially proposed for the AIM 2020 Rendering Realistic Bokeh Challenge.
dcterms:title: EBB!
